title: When England Tried to Tame Ireland’s Unruliest Province

title: Topological turning points across the human lifespan
description: Researchers discovered five phases of brain rewiring across the lifespan. The eras of childhood, adolescence, adulthood, early aging, and late aging each have characteristic rewiring of structural connections across the whole brain.

title: Jimmy Cliff, reggae giant and star of landmark film ‘The Harder They Come,’ dead at 81
description: His family posted a message that he died from a “seizure followed by pneumonia.”

title: ABX London to feature Laurent Mekies and spotlight power shift across motorsport

title: ABX London to feature Laurent Mekies and spotlight power shift across motorsports
description: The Autosport Business Exchange heads to London just ahead of the 2026 racing season

title: Jimmy Cliff, reggae giant and star of landmark Jamaican film ‘The Harder They Come,’ dead at 81
description: Cliff was nominated for seven Grammys and won twice for best reggae album.

title: Jimmy Cliff, reggae legend and star of ‘The Harder They Come, dies at 81
description: Cliff was nominated for seven Grammys and won twice for best reggae album. Many still know his music by "Many Rivers to Cross."

title: Jimmy Cliff Death: 'The Harder They Come' Reggae Superstar Dies at 81
description: Jimmy Cliff, the reggae superstar credited with bringing the music to the world with his film 'The Harder They Come' has died at 81.

title: Reggae pioneer Jimmy Cliff dies at 81
